text: Michael English (24 December 1930 – 13 July 2019) was a British Labour Party politician. He was a Member of Parliament for the British Parliament for Nottingham West from 1964 to 1983. English died on 13 July 2019 at the age of 88.Members of our Association who have died during 2019 ==References== ==Other websites== * Peter Fry interview at History of Parliament Online Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 1964–1966 Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:Politicians from Nottinghamshire Category:People from Nottingham Category:Politicians from Liverpool
title: Michael English (politician)
